attributes.action: Comment on his Personal Opinion of the Judgement Regarding the Anonimity Given to the Tortureres of Jamie Bulger in light of such Strong Public Feeling towards It.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been many eMail circulars regarding the Horrific and Heartless Acts of sheer Evil meated out to young Jamie Bulger by Jon Venables and Robert Thompson, in 1993, and they are growing in number daily. As the leader of the UK I would ask that the PM now let it be known of his own personal feeling to the judgment handed down to the perpitrators of this vile and evil crime ?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
